Key Match Events: Ireland beat Pakistan for the first time in a T20 match
Andrew Balbirnie and Harry Tector formed a 77-run partnership
George Dockrell's 24 runs on 12 balls turned out to be the turning point of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time when Ireland hosted Pakistan in T20Is
Others: Ireland won by five wickets in the three-match T20 series opener
Batting first, Pakistan posted 182/6 as skipper Babar Azam starred with 57 off 43 balls
Pakistan lost Mohammad Rizwan (1) early in the innings
Shaheen Shah Afridi also remained unbeaten, scoring 13 runs from 7 deliveries, hitting two sixes
